title: Room in house offered
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


Choice of two rooms available in shared house of three in Southfields. One large at £600/m and smaller one at £550/m. Includes lighting, heating, internet, TV licence, so no extras. No deposit but rent monthly in advance by standing order. Use of shared living room with TV, shared kitchen, central heating. Room has bed and storage. Bathroom and downstairs cloakroom. Garden. Laundry facilities. Easy walk to Southfiels tube. Quiet road with free parking outside house. House is to be extended next summer so price is low to allow for improvements to be made then. Present occupant one professional male age 32.
